description: Volkswagen acquired Navistar International in 2021, splitting off the Scout brand for a new EV brand. Navistar owned International since 1986 and had incorporated the name into its title, but now, the company is rebranding . Navistar International is changing its name to International Trucks, LLC, a move meant to focus on its transition to connected services in the commercial truck space.
author: Chris Teague

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk Investigating High Absenteeism Rates At German Factory
description: In most large companies, rank-and-file employees may go their entire tenure without seeing the CEO in person or hearing from them directly. Tesla’s German workers near Berlin may get more of Elon Musk than they bargained for, however, as the controversial CEO recently said that he would personally look into the plant’s rising rates of absenteeism.
author: Chris Teague

title: Used Car of the Day: 2016 Volkswagen Golf R
description: Today we bring you a two-owner 2016 Volkswagen Golf R.
author: Tim Healey

title: Dash Cam Review: NextBase iQ
description: We don't just review cars around here. Sometimes, we review dash cams. Which is why I found myself driving around with a NextBase iQ on the dash of a rental car quite a while back. And more recently, thanks to an update.
author: Tim Healey

title: Hoosier Jumps Into the Performance Summer Tire Game
description: Just in time for, erm,  autumn , tire company Hoosier is rolling out an extreme high performance summer tire that’s street legal. Called the TrackAttack Pro, it is likely to spawn a line of tires to go up against grippiest variants of the Michelin Pilot Sport range or Continental’s ExtremeContact Force.
author: Matthew Guy

title: QOTD: What Freebie Enticed You to Take a Test Drive?
description: The idea of getting a freebie if you test drive a car is nothing new.
author: Tim Healey

title: 2025 Can-Am Pulse And Origin Review -- Choice Awaits
description: After a decades-long absence, Can-Am motorcycles have returned to market. But rather than attempting to revive the Rotax-powered 2-stroke dirt bikes it was known for in the 1970s, the brand has opted to launch a pair of Rotax-powered e-bikes offering more versatility. The Can-Am Pulse is a nimble urban commuter, whereas the Origin is designed to handle basically any terrain you throw beneath its wheels.
author: Matt Posky

title: Used Car of the Day: 2006 Mercedes- Benz E55 AMG Wagon
description: Ah yes, the modern performance wagon. Enthusiasts tend to love these cars, and that is true of the 2006 Mercedes-Benz E55 AMG wagon.
author: Tim Healey

title: Carlos Ghosn's Superyacht To Be Seized As Part of Legal Ruling
description: The Carlos Ghosn saga kicked off several years ago now, but the case is far from being settled. Several years after the disgraced auto exec fled to Lebanon, the British Virgin Islands High Court ruled that he must surrender a superyacht allegedly purchased using funds he siphoned away from the automaker.
author: Chris Teague

title: Updated: Test Drive a New Chevy Equinox EV in Los Angeles and Get a Free Erewhon Smoothie
description: Social media is packed with people showing off their luxurious lives in coastal California, and the ridiculously overpriced Erewhon grocery store chain has become a darling of people with cash to burn. Chevy seems to think those people are the perfect target for its latest Equinox EV marketing ploy, with the automaker giving free bottles of Erewhon’s viral almost-$20 smoothie to anyone who test drives the new vehicle at one of the chain’s L.A.-area stores.
author: Chris Teague

title: Porsche Macan EV Buyers Get One Year of Free Electrify America Charging Seessions
description: Several automakers offer free public charging vouchers with new EV purchases, and the latest electric Porsche won’t be an exception. The automaker recently announced that 2025 Macan EV buyers would receive a year of free 30-minute charging sessions at Electrify America (EA) stations.
author: Chris Teague

title: QOTD: What Do You Prioritize in a Sports Car?
description: I wrote a mini-review of the 2024 Toyota GR86 today, and I mentioned how that car, when it first launched as a Scion, was criticized for being a fun handler that was lacking in power.
author: Tim Healey

title: Used Car of the Day: 1985 Toyota Supra
description: I swear it's a coincidence that I am bringing you this 1985 Toyota Supra after bringing you drive notes on a modern Toyota sports coupe.
author: Tim Healey

title: Drive Notes: 2024 Toyota GR86 Premium
description: I just returned a 2024 Toyota GR86 Premium to sender this morning, after a week of being both charmed and occasionally annoyed by Toyota's small, speedy sportster.
author: Tim Healey

title: Voyager Returns to Chrysler Lineup as Entry Level Van
description: The Chrysler Voyager is returning to the retail market for the 2025 model year as the value variant of the Pacifica. While it lacks the looks and some of the features of its more luxurious sibling, it’s priced $2,500 lower and seems to be arriving at a point where shoppers might be more willing to re-engage with minivans due to their relative affordability. If you have a family and can only afford one new automobile, having something as versatile as a van might not be the worst idea.
author: Matt Posky

title: Rivian Is Now In the Used EV Business
description: For a long time after their releases, buyers faced extended wait times for the Rivian R1S SUV and R1T pickup. While that situation has largely become a nonissue as the automaker has scaled production and early enthusiasm subsided, Rivian will soon offer buyers another purchasing option that could bring lower prices and much faster delivery times.
author: Chris Teague

title: The Latest Stellantis Layoffs Will Impact Nearly 200 Workers At Its Sterling Heights Plant
description: Stellantis is going through it. Recently, reports have suggested that company CEO Carlos Tavares could be on his way out, as the automaker has struggled financially for much of this year. Now, we’re learning that the company plans to initiate layoffs at one of its Michigan facilities, though the number of impacted workers is small compared to actions taken by rival automakers.
author: Chris Teague

title: Potential "Smaht Pahk" Problem Leads Kia To Recall the New EV9
description: Hyundai and Kia’s Remote Smart Parking Assist (AKA “Smaht Pahk” or RSPA) helps drivers remotely park their vehicles in tight spaces, but a recent recall shows that it might not work perfectly all the time. Kia is recalling the EV9 over concerns that a software glitch could lead to a malfunction in the parking assistance feature and cause a fender-bender.
author: Chris Teague

title: Report: Tesla FSD Works Well Most of the Time - Until It Doesn't
description: Tesla’s Full Self-Driving system (FSD) is impressive, but it’s not actually capable of driving a vehicle by itself. Rated at Level 2 on the SAE automation scale, FSD requires an attentive driver ready to take control at any time. Even so, independent research firm AMCI Testing’s recent study showed that the system functions almost flawlessly in most scenarios, boosting drivers’ confidence, but that sense of security can cause significant problems when things do go awry.
author: Chris Teague

title: QOTD: Is It Car-Buying Time?
description: Yesterday we reported that it might, finally, be a good time to buy a car.
author: Tim Healey

title: Stellantis Takes More Flak, Allegedly Searching For New CEO
description: Stellantis is reportedly seeking a replacement for Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares after the CEO was targeted by the National Dealer Council and United Automobile Workers (UAW). However, it doesn’t sound like Tavares will be getting booted out the door abruptly with Stellantis Chairman John Elkann allegedly fine with just letting his contract expire in 2026. Regardless, there’s a lot of pressure mounting against the automaker — both internally and externally — and it’s the CEO that typically takes the fall.
author: Matt Posky

title: Used Car of the Day: 1978 Unimog CASE 406 Turbo
description: Today we go with another unique find -- we're featuring a 1978 Unimog CASE 406 Turbo.
author: Tim Healey

title: Stuff We Use: Smart Garage Door Openers
description: On our never-ending quest to improve this place by listening to feedback from the B&B, we are taking a new tack with these product posts, choosing instead to focus on items we have actually used or purchased with our own meagre income. After all, if we’re giving you the truth about cars, we ought to give you the truth about car accessories. Anyone fortunate enough to have an enclosed space in which to wrench on their ride probably has an overhead garage door, especially if yer out in the ‘burbs with a single-family home. Automatic garage door openers are ubiquitous in those environments – but there are a few accessories one can add to improve convenience and make life a little bit easier.
author: Matthew Guy

title: Kia EVs to Start Getting Tesla Supercharger Adapters in January
description: After Ford announced that it would join Tesla’s Supercharger standard, several other high-profile automakers quickly followed suit, including Hyundai and Kia. We’re now learning when Kia owners will be able to access the Supercharger network, and owners won’t have to wait long.
author: Chris Teague

title: The 2025 GR Corolla Gets a Price Hike to Go With Its New Automatic Transmission
description: When I bought my 2024 Toyota GR Corolla, I waited several months for the dealer to finally agree to let go of its markup, but it looks like 2025 model-year buyers will have things even worse. Toyota recently released pricing for the new car, which gets an automatic transmission for 2025, and the numbers are up across the board.
author: Chris Teague

title: Ram Updates Heavy Duty Pickups for 2025
description: As one would expect, there will be a raft of grille designs; shown here are ones featuring brightwork on an otherwise color-keyed trim plus a burly dark-hued effort on the Rebel trim. All have the trademark ‘nostrils’, now aligning with the upper edge of the headlamps from which a spear of running lamps are drawn.
author: Matthew Guy

title: RENNtech-Modified 2014 Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG Black Series at No Reserve
description: This 2014 Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG Black Series was modified by RENNtech in the mid-2010s with the addition of their R1 ECU tune and exhaust headers as well as European-market headlights and carbon-shell bucket seats. Finished in Designo Mystic White II over black leather and Alcantara upholstery, the car is powered by a 6.2-liter V8 linked with a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transaxle and a limited-slip differential. It rides on 21" and 22" HRE forged alloy wheels and features an adaptive AMG sport suspension, carbon-ceramic brakes, and a titanium exhaust system. Further equipment includes gullwing doors, a speed-activated carbon-fiber aerofoil, and carbon-fiber exterior and interior accents along with a Bang & Olufsen sound system and COMAND infotainment with AMG Performance Media data tracking. Now with 11k miles, this SLS AMG Black Series is offered at no reserve in Newport Beach, California, with a clean Florida title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1,700-Mile 2014 Ferrari 458 Spider
description: This 2014 Ferrari 458 Spider was initially delivered to Ferrari of Central New Jersey in Edison prior to being purchased by the seller in 2022, and it now has 1,700 miles. It is finished in Rosso Corsa over Sabbia leather upholstery and is powered by a 4.5-liter DOHC V8 linked with a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transaxle and an electronic differential. The car was optioned with 20" five-spoke alloy wheels, a power-retractable hardtop, adaptive xenon headlights, a suspension lift system, carbon-fiber exterior and interior accents, Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, heated power-adjustable seats, and dual-zone automatic climate control. This 458 Spider is now offered with a window sticker, a luggage set, a car cover, service records, the owner's manual, two keys, a battery tender, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Florida title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: Euro 1973 Alfa Romeo GTV 2000
description: This 1973 Alfa Romeo GTV 2000 was delivered new in Switzerland before being brought to the Netherlands in 2012. Chassis AR2439795 was subsequently acquired in 2020 by the current owner, who commissioned a multi-year refurbishment by marque specialist Goos Van Pelt Centro Ricambi in Veen, the Netherlands, that was completed in 2024. Work involved a repaint in Rosso Amaranto, an interior re-trim in brown wool and vinyl, and overhauls of the 2.0L twin-cam inline-four and five-speed manual transmission along with the suspension and brakes. The engine is equipped with dual Dell’Orto carburetors as well as a 123Ignition electronic distributor, and the car rides on Koni shocks with Eibach lowering springs. Further equipment includes 14" CMR wheels and an Imasaf exhaust system in addition to a wood-rimmed Hellebore steering wheel and Jaeger instrumentation. This GTV is now offered by the seller on behalf of the owner with an Alfa Romeo Classiche Certificato di Origine, build records, and Dutch registration.
author: bringatrailer

title: 65-Mile 2018 Ferrari GTC4Lusso V12 70th Anniversary Edition
description: This 2018 Ferrari GTC4Lusso V12 was ordered through the Tailor Made program as a 70th Anniversary Edition with styling that takes inspiration from the 1964 250 LM. Its Rosso Scuderia-finished body has Bianco livery in addition to airbrushed Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, and the interior houses an edition-specific plaque as well as Blu Alcantara that covers the heated power-adjustable front seats. Having 65 miles, this Canadian-market unit was imported to the US in 2024 and is powered by a 6.3-liter V12 that drives all four wheels through a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission and a 4RM EVO four-wheel-drive system. It is further equipped with adaptive magnetorheological dampers, 20" twin five-spoke alloy wheels, adaptve headlights with SBL, a passenger digital display, a suspension lift system, carbon-fiber interior trim, parking cameras, and a 10.25" touchscreen infotainment system. This GTC4Lusso V12 was acquired by the selling dealer in 2024 and is now offered with a luggage set, a pair of Ferrari-branded child booster seats, service records, factory literature, an edition-specific owner's box, a cast model, a car cover, spare parts, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Arizona title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2013 McLaren 12C Spider
description: This 2013 McLaren 12C Spider was produced for the Canadian market and has remained registered in Ontario through the owner's acquisition in 2022, and it is powered by a twin-turbocharged 3.8-liter V8 paired with a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transaxle. Finished in orange over black and orange upholstery, the car has 39k kilometers (~24k miles) and is equipped with bi-xenon headlights, an active rear spoiler, dihedral doors, 20" and 21" HRE wheels, a folding hardtop, ProActive Chassis Control, Launch Control, aftermarket suspension components, navigation, a Meridian sound system, and a touchscreen infotainment system. This 12C Spider is now offered on dealer consignment with a clean Carfax report and Ontario registration.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1997 Acura NSX-T 6-Speed at No Reserve
description: This 1997 Acura NSX-T remained registered to its original owner in New York until 2024, and it has been modified with aftermarket 17" and 18" wheels, AP Racing braking components, a Comptech front sway bar, Schroth racing harnesses, a rear harness bar, and aftermarket suspension components. It is powered by a 3.2-liter DOHC V6 paired with a six-speed manual transaxle and is finished in Spa Yellow Pearl over Onyx leather upholstery. The car is further equipped with a limited-slip differential, a removable body-color roof panel, pop-up headlights, power-adjustable seats, automatic climate control, cruise control, a CD changer, and a Bose sound system. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2024, this NSX-T shows 128k miles and is now offered at no reserve with the owner's manual, spare keys, a set of uninstalled wheels and tires, service records, a battery tender, a car cover, spare parts, a clean Carfax report, and a clean New York title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 22k-Mile 2003 Ferrari 360 Modena 6-Speed
description: This 2003 Ferrari 360 Modena has 22k miles, and it was specified in Rosso Corsa over Beige leather. It is powered by a 3.6-liter V8 paired with a six-speed manual transaxle, and equipment includes a limited-slip differential, 18" five-spoke alloy wheels, a Challenge-style rear grille, Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, power-adjustable Daytona-style seats, a gated shifter, a CD stereo, and automatic climate control. This 360 Modena is now offered by the selling dealer in Florida with the owner's manual, a copy of the window sticker, a pair of driving gloves, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Minnesota title.
author: bringatrailer

title: Modified 1953 Studebaker Commander Coupe
description: This 1953 Studebaker Commander coupe was modified under previous ownership with work that involved reinforcing the frame, fabricating a tubular front end, replacing the floors, refinishing the car in green over cream and tan leather upholstery, and installing a 350ci V8 mated to a TH350 three-speed automatic transmission and a Ford 9″ rear axle with 3.70:1 gearing. Additional equipment includes an Edelbrock carburetor, Mustang II independent front suspension, front coilovers, American Racing 15″ wheels, four-wheel disc brakes, power steering, dual exhaust, frenched headlights and taillights, remote door openers, a mesh grille, power windows, a Lokar gear selector, AutoMeter gauges, Vintage Air climate control, and a stereo. The car was listed on BaT in August 2023 and subsequently acquired by the current owner. This modified Commander is now offered by the seller on behalf of the current owner with build records, wiring diagrams, and a clean Colorado title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2270cc-Powered 1974 Porsche 914
description: This 1974 Porsche 914 was acquired in 2014 by the seller, and was retrofitted in 2016 with a 2,270cc flat-four that was built using a kit from LN Engineering. Repainted in 2024, the car is finished in silver metallic over black vinyl upholstery, and it has a five-speed manual transaxle, a Tangerine Racing ceramic-coated exhaust system, dual Weber carburetors, 15" Fuchs alloy wheels, four-wheel disc brakes, and a push-button Blaupunkt Frankfurt radio with Bluetooth capability. This 914 is offered with an engine build list, service records, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: ca.1880s Fire Hose Cart at No Reserve
description: This fire hose cart is believed to have been constructed in the 1880s and spent time in a fire equipment museum before it was purchased by the selling dealer. The cart is finished in red with gold stripes and has a rectangular frame, wood-spoke wheels, and a tongue with handles in addition to a hose reel, a fabric hose, and an equipment box. This hose cart is now offered by the selling dealer at no reserve in California with a bill of sale.
author: bringatrailer

title: LS1-Powered 1960 Chevrolet Impala Sport Coupe Lowrider
description: This 1960 Chevrolet Impala two-door sport coupe is said to have spent years in Arizona before the seller acquired the vehicle in 2022, and a subsequent body-off refurbishment involved installing an LS1 5.7-liter V8 linked to a 4L60E four-speed automatic transmission. The car was also fitted with an adjustable airbag suspension and was repainted in metallic black over red and multi-color patterned upholstery. Other features include a Continental kit, black and red 13" wire wheels, four-wheel disc brakes, power steering, fender skirts, dual antennas, air conditioning, a retro-style aftermarket stereo, aftermarket speakers, a Velocity aluminum intake manifold, tubular headers, and a dual exhaust system. This modified Impala is now offered with a clean California title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 36k-Mile 1990 Ford Mustang 5.0 LX Convertible 7-Up Edition
description: This 1990 Ford Mustang is one of 4,103 7-Up Edition vehicles produced for the model year and now shows 36k miles. It was initially sold in California and remained registered in the state until the selling dealer's purchase in 2023 from the family of the reported original owner. The car is powered by a 302ci V8 linked with a four-speed automatic transmission and a limited-slip differential and is finished in Deep Emerald Green Metallic over white leather. Equipment includes the Handling Suspension Package, a white convertible top, front disc brakes, 15" steel wheels, a luggage rack, air conditioning, cruise control, and a cassette stereo. Work under current ownership included rebuilding the automatic transmission and replacing the starter solenoid and two window motors. This 7-Up-Edition Mustang is offered by the selling dealer with recent service records, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: Modified 2021 Jeep Gladiator Sport Diesel
description: This 2021 Jeep Gladiator Sport was modified when new by South Florida Jeeps of Fort Lauderdale, Florida, and it rides on a lifted suspension over 20" Fuel Off-Road wheels. Finished in tan bedliner material over brown leather upholstery, it is powered by a 3.0-liter diesel V6 linked with an eight-speed automatic transmission, a dual-range transfer case, and a Trac-Lok rear differential. Additional equipment includes a winch, a vented hood, a roll cage, aftermarket bumpers, a backup camera, and touchscreen infotainment. The truck has been registered in Florida since new and now has 35k miles. Acquired by the selling dealer in August 2023, this Gladiator is offered with a clean Florida title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1964 MG MGB Roadster at No Reserve
description: This 1964 MGB roadster is powered by a replacement 1.8-liter inline-four linked with a four-speed manual transmission, and it was refurbished in dark green over brown leather upholstery under previous ownership. The car has been retrofitted with a chrome luggage rack, replacement chrome 14" wire wheels, an aluminum radiator, PerTronix electronic ignition, a wooden shift knob, and a Sony CD stereo. Further equipment consists of a replacement black fabric soft top, headlight stone guards, front disc brakes, a head-up GPS speedometer, and a heater. Acquired by the current owner in 2023, this MGB is now offered on their behalf by the seller with a clean Utah title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1984 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe Z51 4-Speed
description: This 1984 Chevrolet Corvette coupe is powered by a 5.7-liter L83 V8 paired with a four-speed manual transmission with overdrive and is finished in black over Charcoal leather upholstery. Equipment includes the Z51 Performance Handling Package, a limited-slip differential, 16" turbine-style wheels, Edelbrock shock absorbers, a removable tinted-glass roof panel, a power-adjustable driver's seat, air conditioning, a Delco-Bose sound system, an AM/FM/cassette stereo, and a Borla exhaust system. The car was first registered in New York before it was acquired by the selling dealer in July 2021. This C4 coupe is now offered by the selling dealer in Florida with manufacturer's literature, partial service records, a car cover, an accident-free Carfax report, and a clean New York title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2014 Mercedes-Benz E63 S AMG 4MATIC Wagon
description: This 2014 Mercedes-Benz E63 S AMG 4MATIC wagon is powered by a twin-turbocharged 5.5-liter M157 V8 linked to a seven-speed MCT automatic transmission, a 4MATIC all-wheel drive system, and a rear limited-slip differential. The car is finished in Palladium Silver Metallic over black Nappa leather and has 79k miles. Additional equipment includes 19" AMG double-spoke alloy wheels, ceramic-composite disc brakes, a panoramic sunroof, Parktronic, a surround-view camera, Blind Spot Monitoring, Lane Keep Assist, Distronic Plus adaptive cruise control, heated and ventilated multicontour front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, and COMAND with navigation. This S212 AMG S wagon is now offered by the selling dealer with the owner's manual and a clean Ohio title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1965 Toyota Land Cruiser FJ40
description: This 1965 Toyota Land Cruiser FJ40 is powered by a 3.9-liter F inline-six linked with a three-speed manual transmission and a dual-range transfer case. The truck is finished in white with a removable hardtop over black and brown vinyl upholstery, and equipment includes 15" steel wheels, Warn manually locking front hubs, diamond-plate quarter panel trim, a roll bar, and inward-facing rear jump seats. It was acquired by the seller in 2024, and work performed in preparation for the sale reportedly involved changing the oil and replacing the water pump as well as the thermostat gaskets. This FJ40 is now offered with a conditional Idaho title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 31k-Mile 1986 Mercedes-Benz 560SL
description: This 1986 Mercedes-Benz 560SL remained under the care of a long-term owner who added approximately 12k miles over a period of 26 years, prior to the selling dealer's acquisition. It is powered by a 5.5-liter V8 paired with a four-speed automatic transmission and is finished in Arctic White over Medium Red leather. Features include a limited-slip differential, a black soft top, silver-finished 15" Gullideckel alloy wheels, fog lights, a Becker Grand Prix cassette stereo, electric windows, central locking, cruise control, and automatic climate control. This R107 is now offered in Pennsylvania by the selling dealer with the owner's manual, a clean Carfax report, and a clean New York title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1995 Toyota Land Cruiser GX FZJ80
description: This right-hand-drive 1995 Toyota Land Cruiser GX was purchased by the seller in 2023 and subsequently imported to the US from Japan. Finished in white over a black and gray interior, the truck is powered by a 4.5L 1FZ-FE inline-six linked with a four-speed automatic transmission, a dual-range transfer case, and locking front, center, and rear differentials. A suspension lift has been added, and additional features include 16" five-spoke wheels, rear barn doors, sliding rear windows, aftermarket front bucket seats, a Panasonic head unit, power windows, and air conditioning. This FZJ80 is offered with a clean Washington title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2001 Porsche Boxster S 6-Speed
description: This 2001 Porsche Boxster S is finished in Guards Red over black leather and microsuede and features the Sport Package, Aerokit-style lower bodywork, Recaro seats, 030 sport suspension, a black soft top, 18" twist-style wheels, and an aftermarket exhaust system and fixed rear spoiler. Power is provided by a 3.2-liter flat-six paired with a six-speed manual transaxle. The car has spent time in Ohio and Texas and now has 67k miles. Recently acquired by the selling dealer, this 986 Boxster S is now offered with a clean Carfax report and a clean Texas title.
author: bringatrailer
